messages.subject: Sandra-isms
messages.msgSnippet: ... have tried to figure out how to make THEIR worlds cooler.  Mine got the side benefit of what I learned about how to help keep them happy. This is another
messages.messageBody:
>My world's pretty cool. It has become gradually cooler since I had kids and
have tried to figure out how to make THEIR worlds cooler. Mine got the side
benefit of what I learned about how to help keep them happy.

This is another keeper, Sandra!
Somehow, I have managed to collect a dozen or so short quotes of yours
which just distill it for me!
Often, people comment on how 'easy' things seem in our family, how much
'fun' we have, how it 'flows' pretty well. With school out of the way,
control out of the way, and love and mutual respect in the forefront, my
world is pretty cool, too.
And I don't 'have to' do anything, but be grateful!
Aloha, Lee

NORTH COUNTRY FARMS
